related_post.text: can i hide the selenium window?

so_post.text: > can i hide the selenium window?@Pedro. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16180428/canseleniumwebdriveropenbrowserwindowssilentlyinbackground#:~:text=You%20can%20also%20hack%20about,the%20window%20once%20it's%20opened.&text=If%20you%20are%20using%20Selenium,wrapper%20for%20Xvfb%20and%20Xephyr.&text=Chrome%2057%20has%20an%20option,which%20makes%20the%20window%20invisible.

comments: direct answer to given question and quoted
